articles.title: LSG Owner Sanjiv Goenka Meets Skipper KL Rahul Yet Again After A Loss. Internet On Overdrive - NDTV Sports
articles.description: After Lucknow Super Giants' latest loss in the IPL 2024, Sanjiv Goenka was photographed again with skipper KL Rahul
articles.content: For Lucknow Super Giants, their fate in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2024 play-off race is no longer in their own hands. With a defeat to Delhi Capitals on Tuesday, the KL Rahul-led LSG are all bu… [+1822 chars]
